text: Koba Davitashvili (; July 31, 1971 â€“ December 2, 2020) was a Georgian politician. He was a leader of the Georgian People's Party and co-founder of the United National Movement. He was a member of the Georgian Parliament between 1999 to 2006. Davitashvili died on December 2, 2020 in Tbilisi from ankylosing spondylitis, aged 49. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Tbilisi
title: Koba Davitashvili
